Name: Lust Vessel
About the game: Lust Vessel follows the story of Kate as she goes on a space cruise for her vacation with her best friend, after getting drunk she wakes up alone some days later to find out that everyone has lost themselves to passion. Now Kate need to find out happened on the days that she was drunk, what happened to her best friend, meet interesting characters, find out more about her and her body and maybe solve this problem. Features Losing a battle isn't the end of the game! Kate has scenes with all the enemies. Depending on Kateâ€™s lust level, different options will open or close Over 70 base scenes 15 different endings Different routes for the game, each with different enemies Every character can be romanced and has at least two endings Disclaimer All characters involved in any sexual act in Lust Vessel are over 18 years old.
